mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_ticket ( ticket_id, activity_id, name, detail, icon, hotel_code, spot_code, sychtime ) VALUES ( #{ticketId}, #{activityId}, #{name}, #{detail}, #{icon}, #{hotelCode}, #{spotCode}, #{sychtime} )
mapper.select: select ticket_id as ticketId, activity_id as activityId, name, detail, icon, hotel_code as hotelCode, spot_code as spotCode, sychtime from mc_ticket where activity_id = #{0}
